title: LAND for Hotels, Supermarkets & Apartment COMPLEXES in Nuwara Eliya
details:
NUWARA ELIYA - 83 Perches with 124 ft of Road Frontage! at Rs 2.5M per Perch OR 1st Block of 35 Perches with 183 ft of Dual Road Frontage at Rs 3M per Perch and 2nd Block of 35 Perches with 109 ft of Road Frontage at 2.75M per Perch. Hard ground and Flat Land, among very limited “Freehold Properties” (NOT Govt. Permit Land) situated in a ‘PRIME Location’ within 500M to “Heart of Town” and “ONE of a kind”!

Suitable for Mixed Development, such as Hotels, Apartment Complexes, Supermarkets, Shopping Malls, Offices etc going up to 6 Floors!

Clear Title, acceptable for Bank Funding.
Call +94772280690 for more particulars
